day.name: Nativity of St. John the Baptist
The Presentation of Christ in the Temple
The Second to Last Sunday after Epiphany
Palm Sunday: Liturgy of the Palms
Easter Day: Early Service
day.lesson: Genesis 1:1—2:3 or Genesis 3 or Genesis 7:1-5; 11-18; 8:8-18; 9:8-13 or Genesis 22:1-18 or Exodus 14:10—15:1 or Isaiah 4:2-6 or Ezekiel 36:24-28 or Ezekiel 37:1-14 or Daniel 3:1-28 or Jonah 1:1-2:10 or Zephaniah 3:12-20
